citation.title: Modeling solid-state chemistry: Interatomic potentials for multicomponent systems
citation.abstract: A general form is proposed for an empirical interatomic potential for multicomponent systems. This form interpolates between potentials for the respective elements to treat heteronuclear bonds. The approach is applied to C-Si and Si-Ge systems. In particular, the properties of SiC and its defects are well described.
